attributes.action: Lord Freud has got to go.
attributes.additional_details: I am asking for Lord Freud to be asked to leave parliament due to his recent discrimination against disabled people. He has said that people with disabilities are not worth the full minimum wage and some are worth £2 an hour. This man does not represent the views of Britain, he is discriminating against vulnerable people and I find this sickening. He must not be allowed in parliament.
